xml.basic: What is testing, bug reports, documentation, types, methods, testing directions, SDLC, STLC
xml.http: methods, codes, HTTP request and response structures
xml.api: API testing via Postman, JS, API autotests
xml.charles: Sniffing http web traffic, mobile traffic via Charles and Fiddler on iOS and Android
xml.sql: Create, Delete, Drop, Insert Into, Select, From, Where, Join
xml.vpn: How it works, why you need it, how to use it, tool options
xml.mobile: Feature iOS, Android, guidelines, building iOS applications on Xcode, building Android applications on Android Studio, ADB
xml.redis: installation, configuration and use Stress testing development methodology learning the basics, creating a client-server application
